price: Has he obtained knowledge of the unseen, or has he taken a pledge with the Most Compassionate?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا
